scripts.build:all: npm run build:frontend && npm run compile:all
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.compile:all: npm run compile:win32 && npm run compile:win64 && npm run compile:linux64
scripts.compile:win32: GOOS=windows CC=i686-w64-mingw32-gcc CGO_ENABLED=1 GOARCH=386 go build -o $npm_package_config_output_path/windows/x86/$npm_package_config_binary_name.exe server/main.go
scripts.compile:win64: GOOS=windows CC=x86_64-w64-mingw32-gcc CGO_ENABLED=1 GOARCH=amd64 go build -o $npm_package_config_output_path/windows/amd64/$npm_package_config_binary_name.exe server/main.go
scripts.compile:linux64: GOOS=linux CGO_ENABLED=1 GOARCH=amd64 go build -o $npm_package_config_output_path/linux/amd64/$npm_package_config_binary_name server/main.go
